title: Cardi B joins Furious 9 and hangs with Vin Diesel on set
text:
Cardi B’s part of the Furious 9 gang (Picture: Vin Diesel, Instagram)

Furious 9 just got a whole lot louder as Cardi B has confirmed she’s joined the star-studded cast.

Vin Diesel, who plays Dominic Toretto, announced the exciting news with an Instagram video in which he hangs out with the Bodak Yellow rapper on set of the blockbuster in London.

In the caption, the actor wrote: ‘Last day in the UK! Pa mi Gente… #Fast92020 #Fatherhood.’

Pretty exhausted from the several months of shooting, Vin said in the clip: ‘Day 86 here on the set of Fast 9. I know I’m exhausted. I literally — we all gave every single thing we could for this movie. Put it all on the table. Put it all out there.’

Cardi agreed: ‘I’m tired. But I can’t wait,’ before teasing confidently: ‘I ain’t gonna front, I think this is gonna be the best one.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Her new pal Vin chimed in: ‘We’re so blessed. The last day of filming in the U.K. All love always.’

And in typical Cardi fashion, she added: ‘Yup. I need to take a nappy nap.’

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

It’s about to be a wild, wild ride.

Their Furious 9 co-star Jordana Brewster welcomed the late addition to the cast and said: ‘Yaaaaaasssssssssssssssss,’ with several prayer hands emojis so we’re guessing she’s pretty excited.

It’s not yet known which character Cardi B will play but no doubt she’ll make her mark with the adrenaline-junky crew.

Cardi, 27, appears to be forging a place for herself in Hollywood after making her movie debut in Hustlers, alongside Jennifer Lopez and Constance Wu.

Latin star Ozuna has also joined the cast (Picture: Vin Diesel, Instagram)

The I Like It rapper recently teased her plans to continue acting, telling Ellen DeGeneres: ‘I’m going to shoot for a film this month. I enjoy the checks.’

Cardi isn’t the only musician to join Furious 9 as Latin star Ozuna has also joined the cast, marking his first role in an English-speaking movie.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Doing the honours again of welcoming the new addition to the cast, Vin said in an Instagram video: ‘As you know, we have often found great talent in the music industry to cross over into film.

‘They are expected to leave all the accolades at the door to embrace the character with integrity … and that is exactly what Ozuna has done. ‘Very proud of your work and role in Fast 9.’

Furious 9, which also stars Michelle Rodriguez, Tyrese Gibson and Nathalie Emmanuel, is set to arrive in UK cinemas on 22 May 2020.

description: Cardi B has joined the cast of Furious 9 with Vin Diesel doing the honours of announcing the news.
